ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a refreshing change from your usual lettuce salads. Fennel is excellent for your digestion too!"
ins: Combine the fennel and mandarin oranges with a tablespoon of the juice from the canned oranges in a bowl. Add the olive oil and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper; stir. Allow to sit 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
